description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

背景介绍：

Alpais Lam Wai-sze, 42, who works at a primary school in Hong Kong, has taught for 18 years. In the 2010/2011 academic year, she won the Chief Executive's Award for Teaching Excellence alongside her school's teaching team for moral and civic education.

A video was recorded on July 14 when Lam openly criticised the way police were dealing with the dispute involving the Falun Gong. Police threatened to arrest Lam when she asked for an explanation of why they had cordoned off the area near Sai Yeung Choi Street where the dispute was taking place.

Lam shouted foul language at the officers. The video was later uploaded onto YouTube and went viral later. And this incident triggered a rally which involved more than 3000 people.

To her supporters, Miss Lam is a free-speech heroine. To her critics, she’s a foulmouthed person who should apologize for directing unprintable words toward police officers and insisted that she should perform her job anymore.

Miss Lam made a apology openly to her students, refusing to apologise to the officers, and admitted that she should not use the foul language to express her rage.

话题：

1. Please express your feeling towards this incident. Do you think Miss Lam is a good teacher?

范例1：

Such a storm in the teacup, triggered a 3000-people demonstration, ending up in chaos, surely came out of surprise. The residents in Hong Kong, recently, seemed losing their reason and are very likely to go extreme. As a teacher also, I would like to take a stand on whether it is appropriate to a primary school teacher shouting obscenities in public.

Being a teacher is a bit different from any other careers as most of us usually put a high expectation on them. Teachers have great impact on their innocent students. There is a code of conduct they are assumed to follow and they should stay away from any negative behaviours. Back in the first day being a teacher, I started behaving myself and avoided acting recklessly as it would put me in a awkward situation if my students was watching me hiding in a corner. As a green hand, I am aware of the rules while a hardened teacher like Miss Lam should realise them too.

Speaking foul language in school is straightly forbidden meanwhile teachers must restrain themselves from swearing too. Moreover, the police was merely preforming their duty at the moment. They deserve respect and cooperation, not humiliation.

范例2：

As for a man who grew up in Chinese mainland and never had a chance to put foot on the soil of Hongkong, the music and movies from Hongkong opened the first door towards freedom, democracy and fraternity.
Thus, deep in my heart, Hongkong is the symbol and beacon of the free world. In 1997, when I was a junior high school student, I watched the ceremony of return of Hongkong with proud and excitement. Sixteen years later, the light of this beacon becomes feebler and feebler due to the burnout of the strength of democratic power. The Lam Wai-sze incident is such an epitome of the fall of Hongkong under the occupation of Communist party.

I have no good feeling towards Falun gong and I do not like using abusive words. However, in a society in which people used to enjoy rights of free speech, when facing the repression of communist gangsters and the inaction of police, the curse with abusive words is the only way for an individual with integrity and dignity to express her outrage. Unfortunately, some idiots in Hongkong do not comprehend -- the devils do not care about the civilized manners, they only want your flesh.

description:
《英闻天天译》是一档沪江部落的原创翻译互动节目（戳去参与节目>>>），主持人提供翻译参考文本，对大家递交的翻译作品进行点评，和大家共同进步！本期节目选取的是美政府不靠谱吃皇粮也塞牙的一则英文报道，让我们一起在翻译中关注美政府不靠谱吃皇粮也塞牙的情况！

CONTENT：

OBAMACARE'S federal exchanges have gotten off to a rather rockystart, compared to the state-run exchanges, which are apparently doing much better. But one thing you can say about Obamacare's health exchanges, whetherfederal or state-run: they exist. The websites are up, and you can visit them.The people who build and operate them are going to work and getting paid.Which, in the current shut down, is more than you can say for a lot of the government.

For example,over at NASA, a crew of about 15 physicists, engineers and several grad students are supposed to be working on the Primordial Inflation Polarization Explorer(PIPER), a precisioninstrument to measure the polarisation of the Cosmic Microwave Background inorder to test the inflation theory of theorigins of the universe. The researchers need to create new sensors that candetect the polarisation of variations of one to ten nanokelvins in the2.7-kelvin Cosmic Microwave Background. Then they're supposed to put theinstrument on a 100-metre balloon and send it up from various sites in thenorthern and southern hemispheres. But they're not working on that! They're twiddling their thumbs and doing nothing of any use to anyone.

KEYWORDS：

· hemisphere 半球

· twiddle 玩弄

参考译文2：

奥巴马医改中的健康保险交易所分为州营和国营两种，前者运营状态良好，而后者却在一开始就面临了重重困难。虽然如此，所有的健康保险交易依旧正常营业。政府建立了相关网站供人们浏览并为其运营者们提供相应的报酬。考虑到日前政府因缺乏资金停摆的情况，你能吐槽的事还不止这一件。

例如最近在国家航天局，15个来自不同学科背景的研究者组成了一个新的科研小组。他们中有物理学家、工程师和大学毕业生，这些人将利用一种名为原始膨胀极化探测器的精密仪器来测量宇宙微波辐射条件下的膨胀极化情况，从而探索宇宙起源论之一的暴胀理论。按计划，研究者们需要研制出一种新的感应器，这个新的感应器将能在宇宙微波辐射为2.7开尔文时探测膨胀极化变化的数值。然后，研究者们将把仪器放到一个100米的热气球上，并从分布在南北半球的多个地点让其升入高空。以上是此次科研项目的具体计划，不过这也只是个计划而已。到目前为止，那些所谓的专家学者除了无所事事还是无所事事,什么有实际意义的贡献都没有。
